Package btp400.lab4

Class Student

java.lang.Object
btp400.lab4.Student
public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
Sample btp400.lab4.Student class for BTP400 @ Seneca College. Used as a starting point for Winter 2021 Lab 4.
Author:
EDEN.BURTON

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student()
      Create the tables once the student class is instantiated

    • Student

      Student​(java.lang.String nm, int num)
      Create a new student.
      Parameters:
      nm - - name
      num - - student number

    • Student

      Student​(int num, java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String password)
      Constructs a Student object and attempts to log in and retrieve a student's results
      Parameters:
      num - the student number whose results to retrieve
      userId - the id of the user attempting to log in
      password - the password of the user attempting to log in

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String password) throws java.lang.Exception
      Logs a user in

      Compares the entered password and stored password for a userId.

      Parameters:
      userId - the User id for the user attempting to log in
      password - the password for the user attempting to log in
      Returns:
      true on login success or false on login failure
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if a connection to the database could not be established

    • add

      public boolean add​(java.lang.String c, Term t, int y, Grade f)
      Adds adds a new result to the list of results
      Parameters:
      c - the course associated with the result
      t - the term associated with the result
      y - the year of the result
      f - the grade of the result
      Returns:
      true on success or false on failure

    • save

      public void save()
      Persists the student's results to the database

    • getGPA

      public double getGPA()
      Obtains the student GPA based on all the courses taken.
      Returns:
      the average GPA or zero if the student's results have not been added

    • getClassGPA

      public static double getClassGPA​(java.lang.String courseCode, Term t, int y, java.util.Set<Student> studentSet)
      Return the GPA for a given class. The class can be uniquely identified by the course code, year and term.

      The list of students is passed in as a parameter.

      Parameters:
      courseCode - - course code representing course
      t - - term class took place in
      y - - Year class occurred
      studentSet - - A set of students (who, may or may not be in that class)
      Returns:
      the average GPA for a given class or zero if the students are not in the class or the set is empty

    • printResult

      public void printResult()
      print student results onto console. It shall be in the following format [btp400.lab4.Student ID, btp400.lab4.Student Name, Course Code, Course Description] with each result on a different line.
